name: Triple Pulse
overview:
Triple Pulse is designed to help you live a more active and energetic life. Unlike other men’s health publications, Triple pulse takes a simple, threefold approach toward improving your lifestyle. Everyday, a tip will be sent directly to your email on one of the following topics:

1.) Fitness: Keep your workouts fresh and your body guessing 2.) Inspiration: Stay motivated even when life gets hectic 3.) Eats: Fuel… your body and achieve your new lifestyle

We know how busy life can get. With the stress of work and family obligations, it is easy to let health and fitness take a back seat. Therein lies the beauty of Triple Pulse. Fitness, Inspiration, and Eats are delivered right to you. You’ll never have to seek out information about healthy living again. Better yet, we have a rule here at Triple Pulse; no tips over 250 words. That means you’ll always have time to fuel your day with fitness.
